Welcome to Django-Mangopay’s documentation!¶



Django-Mangopay is a Django wrapper for the PSP Mangopay’s V2 API. More specifically it provides Django-specfic functionality around Mangopay’s Python SDK. It creates a Mangopay Client via settings in your settings.py. It provides Django Models that allow you to persist the data that you need to send and recieve from Mangopay. These models have functions that correspond to the Mangopay’s API calls. Celery tasks are also provided if you want to call these functions asynchronously. Read extended documentation is provide at Read the Docs.

Contents:

  • Correspondance to Mangopay Rest API
    • Access
      • POST /v2/oauth/token
    • Activity, research & lists

      • POST /users/natural
    • Wallets
    • PayIns

  • Settings
